```{r}
little_test <- read_faa("R/little_test.fasta")

#add row to test df with made up sequence to test remove_standardaa function
bad_seq_df <- data.frame("fake_nonstandard_sequence", "MKVTHEUSYR$GXMBIJIDGM80-%")
names(bad_seq_df) <- c("seq.name", "seq.aa")
bad_seq_test_df <- rbind(little_test, bad_seq_df)

batamp_df <- data.frame('G1P6H5_MYOLU', "MALTVRIQAACLLLLLLASLTSYSLLLSQTTQLADLQTQDTAGATAGLMPGLQRRRRRDTHFPICIFCCGCCYPSKCGICCKT")
names(batamp_df) <- c("seq.name", "seq.aa")


df <- rbind(batamp_df, bad_seq_df)
```



```{r}

good_seqs_df <- remove_nonstandard_aa(bad_seq_test_df , bad_seq_test_df $seq.aa)

remove_nonstandard_aa(df, df$seq.aa)

grepl('^[ARNDCEQGHILKMFPSTWYV]+$', df$seq.aa)
```
